titleStmt.title: Vaticinium causuale. A rapture occasioned by the late miraculous deliverance of His Highnesse the Lord Protector, from a desperate danger. With, a noverint universi, in the close. / By Geo: Wither, Esq;
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Ratcliffe, and E. Mottershed.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Juggler" beneath 'Geo: Wither'; "8ber. [i.e October] 14."; the 5 in imprint date has been crossed out, date altered to 1654.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
